definitions.body: ), 1Ki 20:29 [[וַיַּחֲנוּ אֵלֶּה נׁכַח אֵלֶּה]], 1Ki 22:35 (= 2Ch 18:34), Es 5:1, Es 5:1; Ez Eze 46:9 Qr [[כִּי נִכְחוֹ יֵחֵא]] shall go out in front of himself, i.e. straightforward; cf. [[נֶגְדּוֹ]], [[נֶגֶד]]

definitions.body: (b). Fig. Pr 5:21 [[דַּרְכֵי אִישׁ]] ´[[כִּי נׁכַח עֵינֵי י]] in the sight  of ´[[י]]'s eyes are, etc., Ju Jdg 18:6 [[דַּרְכְּכֶם]] ´[[נׁכַח י]] before ´[[י]] is your way, i.e. under his eye and favourable regard. In the phr.
